pages.text: Built on the core belief that “Happiness is Pizza,” Crust Woodfired Pizza is a neighborhood cornerstone, a cozy and intimate retreat located on James Island in the Terrace Plaza. Following 10+ years in business, Crust is recognized for its Neapolitan-style pizzas, thoughtfully curated ingredients, comforting pasta dishes, and outstanding seasonal salads. Crust is a sought-after culinary destination for tourists, and a cherished establishment for locals to enjoy unbeatable happy hour specials and a friendly staff that is guaranteed to make you feel like family. Hours SUNDAY – THURSDAY 11AM-9PM FRIDAY – SATURDAY 11AM-10PM VIEW MENU FOLLOW US! REWARDS GIFT CARDS Contact 843.762.5500 1956 MAYBANK HIGHWAY #B CHARLESTON, SC 29412 Know Before You Go: To-go orders can be placed in person or by phone. Online ordering is not available. 3-5 pm is considered our quiet hours, come then and skip the wait! The parking lot is shared with other local businesses, please prepare for limited parking during peak hours and holidays. Rideshare is encouraged. Walk-ins are seated on a first come first serve basis. No reservations at this time. Join Our Team APPLY HERE (843) 762-5500 info@crustwoodfiredpizza.com Happinessis Pizza
